for this help."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::Magmatron::
> 
>     Well, not many can fly, but can be equipped," He said, Then he 
turned to the comm. "Any flying Destron, go and help the Alliance 
attack Hell Beast's base. Any bot that cannot fly, see if you can 
manage a flight pack, if not then go and help at the CF. The 
Alliance, not the Maximals."
